hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Boss Key# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Map of the Deku Tree#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Having trouble breathing underwater?^Have you tried wearing more BLUE?

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Slingshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #2 Deku Scrubs#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Deku Tree Compass# and #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Green Rupee#.
